welcome.title: <:raidenbird:1080897824440455288> Raijin Discord Bot
welcome.details:
So... you want to start a new adventure with me ?

> ・ Raijin Discord Bot is an Unofficial Genshin Impact Discord Bot using ONLY Slash Commands
> ・ I can start the adventure for you with `/account start`
> ・ To end the adventure with me use `/account end`
> ・ When your account is created use `/story mode` and enjoy the adventure <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396>
> ・ During your adventure you can fight bosses, recover your health with Archons Statues, fight hilichurls, discover daily quests and more...
> ・ I let you discover that by yourself using `/help` <:raidenlaugh:1080898399336931429>
> ・ You have more questions ? Well then I let you enter in [Raijin City](https://discord.gg/2AePNcphrs) ⚡

<:beta:1233039955631276172> **Warning**: Currently in **BETA** version, some commands may not work as expected

account.details: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> You do not have an account, use `/account start` to create one

commands.title: Error with the command
commands.details:
Please retry later <:raidencry:1189307566606520501>
Look at [Raijin Status Page](https://raijin.statuspage.io/) to check if an event related to an error or a maintenance is in progress

creation.existing: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> Your account is already open, to reset it use : `/account end`
creation.created:
<:raidenlaugh:1080898399336931429> **Your account has been successfully created** {user}
You can now start your adventure and explore the different commands of Raijin. Story mode is a scalable storytelling that will make your adventure unique through your choices and regular content additions
If you need help use : `/help`
creation.wrong_uid: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> The UID doesn't seem to be correct, UID is the 9-digit number of your in-game account

deletion.deleted: <:raidenlaugh:1080898399336931429> Your account has been deleted successfully {user}
deletion.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? {user}

help.title: So... you requested Raijin help ?
help.description:
Well then select a category down there that can help you <:raidenbird:1080897824440455288>

**Specific command**
You need help with a specific command ? Visit the [Raijin Documentation](https://docs.codingmakoto.dev/) to get more details about how to use it

**Useful links**
 • ⚡ [Raijin City](https://discord.gg/2AePNcphrs)
 • <:github:1233415410641272903> [Raijin Github](https://github.com/CodingMakoto/Raijin)

account.title: <:raidencards:1287740296662220931> Need some help in your adventure ?
account.description:
These are the commands related to your profile in your adventure, they allow you to manage your adventure as you wish. All these commands are explained on the [Raijin Documentation](https://docs.codingmakoto.dev/)

**Commands**
> /account start
> /account end

profile.title: <:raidenfight:1189307569739661312> Need some help with your profile ?
profile.description:
Here are the commands related to your profile in your adventure, they allow you to see how your adventure evolves with Raijin, as in Genshin Impact. All these commands are explained on the [Raijin Documentation](https://docs.codingmakoto.dev/)

**Commands**
> /profile in-game
> /profile uid

account.title: Account
account.description: Manage your new trip with Makoto

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Follow your adventure with Raijin and Genshin Impact

profile.api_failed: <:raidenwhat:1287740294866927658> Raijin is unable to retrieve your information, please check the available information on [Raijin Status Page](https://raijin.statuspage.io/) or try again later

uid.saved: <:raidenbird:1080897824440455288> Your UID has been saved successfully
uid.invalid: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> The UID does not appear to be valid. This is the 9 or 10 digit number of your in-game account
uid.removed: <:raidenbird:1080897824440455288> Your UID has been removed successfully

not_existing.member: {user} does not have an account with Raijin <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396>
not_existing.author: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> You do not have an account, use `/account start` to create one

uid_not_existing.member: {user} has no registered UID with Raijin <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396>
uid_not_existing.author: <:raidenannoyed:1287740293386469396> You do not have a saved UID, use `/profile uid` to save one
